inclusion.criterion: Adequate bone quality for insertion of a cementless acetabular component
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age 70 years and above, capable and empowered
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient may only participate with one hip
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe nerve, muscle and vascular disease in the lower extremities
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients that during surgery are assessed not suitable for treatment with cementless hip prosthesis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe osteoporosis (T-score < 4.0) as assessed by DXA scan before surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have previously undergone correction of bone malalignment of the hip or other major hip surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has osteoarthritis of the hip joint and adequate bone quality for insertion of a cementless acetabular component. However, their age is not specified as above 70 years.
